instructions: "IMMEDIATELY call checkOperationStatus with operationId \"op_getInstagramPostsByUser_1771880557036_vx5a94\" to get results. This is required - do not wait or try alternative approaches. Results will include: (1) paginated data, (2) dataDumpExportOperationId for CSV file url. YOU MUST ALSO call checkOperationStatus with the dataDumpExportOperationId to get the S3 download link."
progressToken: op_getInstagramPostsByUser_1771880557036_vx5a94
howPollingWorks: "HOW POLLING WORKS: This operation runs in the background. To get results, you must use checkOperationStatus tool with the operationId provided below."
pollingMechanism: "POLLING MECHANISM: (1) Call checkOperationStatus immediately with the operationId. (2) If status is \"running\", wait 5 seconds and call checkOperationStatus again. (3) Repeat step 2 until status becomes \"completed\", \"failed\", or \"cancelled\". (4) When completed, the response will contain your results."
whyPollingRequired: "WHY POLLING IS REQUIRED: Operations process data asynchronously (often thousands of records). Results are not available immediately - you must actively check status until completion."
whatToExpect: "WHAT TO EXPECT: First checkOperationStatus call will likely return \"running\" status with progress info. Continue polling every 5 seconds. Final call will return complete results with data."
csvExportNote: "IMPORTANT: A full dataset CSV export is automatically initiated. You will receive a dataDumpExportOperationId in the results."
codeExecutionTip: "The dataDumpExportOperationId will be in format \"op_datadump_TIMESTAMP_RANDOM\". Use it with checkOperationStatus to get the S3 signed URL for downloading the complete dataset CSV."
